official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of Transportation to develop a
		  rule that does not allow Federal funds under the disadvantaged business
		  enterprise program to be used for any enterprise that is no longer eligible
		  under such program, and for other purposes.

text.#text:
does not allow Federal funds under the
			 disadvantaged business enterprise program, described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:

text.#text:
90 days after the date of enactment of this
			 Act, each grant award, contract, or subcontract under the disadvantaged
			 business enterprise program prohibits any Federal funds under the program to be
			 provided to an enterprise as soon as the enterprise is no longer eligible under
			 such program;

recuperates any
			 unobligated funds made available under the disadvantaged business enterprise
			 program to any enterprise no longer eligible under the program; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall take such measures as are practicable to
			 expedite bidding with other eligible enterprises to complete any project
			 started by the no longer eligible enterprise.

text.#text:
ensures that if a
			 disadvantaged business enterprise is no longer eligible to receive funds under
			 the program, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall allow such entity to
			 complete any existing projects but shall not allow such enterprise to be
			 eligible for additional funds for any new projects unless the State in which
			 the enterprise is located recertifies it in accordance with
